title: Tesla stops taking orders for cheapest Cybertruck, offers $100,000 version now
description: Tesla has stopped taking orders for its $61,000 Cybertruck, prioritizing the $100,000 version for immediate delivery. Although the truck had 1 million reservations, demand is tepid for the higher-priced models. Begun in November 2023, the Cybertruck faced delays and high costs. High inventory levels for the more expensive variants remain a concern.
